hero.title: Transforming data into
hero.description: We are Aiuda Labs, a startup specialized in the latest generative AI trends, data science, data engineering, and machine learning. We create innovative solutions that drive your business growth.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive AI and data solutions to drive your business

generativeAI.title: Generative AI
generativeAI.description: We implement the latest generative AI technologies to automate processes, create content, and enhance user experience.

dataScience.title: Data Science
dataScience.description: We extract valuable insights from your data to make informed and strategic decisions that drive growth.

dataEngineering.title: Data Engineering
dataEngineering.description: We design and build robust infrastructures for the management, processing, and storage of large-scale data.

machineLearning.title: Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: We develop personalized machine learning models that learn from your data to automate decisions and processes.

about.title: About Aiuda Labs
about.lead: We are an innovative startup focused on democratizing access to the most advanced artificial intelligence technologies.
about.description: At Aiuda Labs, we believe that AI and data analysis are the key tools to solve the most complex challenges of the modern world. Our team of experts combines deep technical knowledge with strategic vision to deliver solutions that truly impact.

latam.title: Serving Clients Across LATAM
latam.description: Bilingual teams with deep understanding of Latin American business context, cultural nuances, and regulatory requirements including LGPD and regional compliance standards.

contact.title: Ready to transform your business?
contact.subtitle: Contact us and discover how AI can revolutionize your company

partnership.title: Let's Build a Partnership
partnership.description: We believe in long-term strategic partnerships (acompañamiento), not one-off projects. Let's discuss how we can help your business grow.

footer.description: Transforming the future with artificial intelligence and data analysis.
footer.latam: Serving clients across Mexico, Colombia, Argentina, Brazil, and Chile

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.message: Your message has been sent successfully. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

header.title: Where AI Meets Ayuda
header.subtitle: Our name tells our story: artificial intelligence that genuinely helps
header.equation: Technology that works for your business, not the other way around

foundingInsight.title: The Founding Insight
foundingInsight.content: AIuda Labs was founded on a simple but powerful conviction: Artificial Intelligence should help businesses, not complicate them. Our name—blending AI with the Spanish word 'ayuda' (help)—embodies our mission to make AI accessible, practical, and genuinely useful.

missionEvolution.title: The Mission Evolution
missionEvolution.content: What began as a commitment to 'helpful AI' has evolved into a comprehensive approach to technology transformation. We guide organizations through cloud migrations enhanced by AI optimization, data platforms that enable machine learning, and infrastructure that scales intelligently.
missionEvolution.accent: Technology that doesn't help isn't worth implementing

regionalCommitment.title: The Regional Commitment
regionalCommitment.content: Latin America represents one of the world's most dynamic markets for AI adoption, with 95% of tech executives recognizing its transformational potential. AIuda Labs exists to bridge gaps with bilingual teams who understand both technology and business context.

mission.quote: We exist to make artificial intelligence genuinely helpful for businesses—from startups to enterprises, across Latin America and beyond

stats.label: LATAM execs see GenAI as transformational
Faster process cycles our clients achieve

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Integrated technology solutions that combine proven IT expertise with cutting-edge AI innovation

digitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation Consulting
digitalTransformation.description: Enterprise-wide transformation roadmaps that align technology investments with business objectives

features.title: Maturity assessment
features.description: Current state analysis and gap identification

digitalTransformation.helpText: We don't just recommend technology—we partner with you to ensure your team can sustain improvements long after engagement ends, building capability rather than dependency.

technologyStrategy.title: Technology Strategy
technologyStrategy.description: Multi-year technology planning that balances innovation with pragmatic implementation

features.title: Architecture review
features.description: Current state assessment and optimization opportunities

technologyStrategy.helpText: Navigate complex technology decisions with confidence, backed by our expertise across cloud platforms, AI frameworks, and enterprise systems.

aiReadiness.title: AI Readiness Assessment
aiReadiness.description: Comprehensive evaluation of your organization's preparedness for AI adoption

features.title: Use case identification
features.description: High-impact AI opportunities specific to your business

features.title: ROI modeling
features.description: Financial impact projections and implementation roadmap

aiReadiness.helpText: Skip the hype and focus on AI applications that deliver measurable business value, with realistic timelines and resource requirements.

cloudInfrastructure.title: Cloud & Infrastructure
cloudInfrastructure.description: Multi-cloud strategy, migration, and optimization enhanced by AI-powered cost management

features.title: Cloud migration
features.description: AWS, Azure, GCP - lift-and-shift or re-architecture

features.title: Cost optimization
features.description: AI-driven resource rightsizing and waste reduction

cloudInfrastructure.helpText: Startups get rapid cloud implementation in 30-90 days. Enterprises get phased migration strategies that ensure business continuity while modernizing infrastructure.

dataAI.title: Data & AI
dataAI.description: End-to-end data platform modernization from warehousing to advanced AI/ML capabilities

features.title: Data platform modernization
features.description: Modern data warehouses, lakes, and lakehouses

dataAI.helpText: We build data platforms that don't just store information—they actively help teams make better decisions through AI-powered insights and automation.

securityCompliance.title: Security & Compliance
securityCompliance.description: Cybersecurity services with AI governance and LATAM regulatory expertise

features.title: AI governance & risk
features.description: Responsible AI frameworks, bias detection, explainability

securityCompliance.helpText: Implementing AI without proper governance creates risk. We ensure your AI systems are secure, compliant, and trustworthy from day one.

platformEngineering.title: Platform Engineering
platformEngineering.description: Modern DevOps, application modernization, and intelligent automation
platformEngineering.helpText: Modernize your development pipeline to reduce deployment time by 40-70% while maintaining the security and compliance standards critical for enterprise operations.

projectManagement.title: Project Management Office
projectManagement.description: Agile delivery with AI-powered insights and intelligent tracking
projectManagement.helpText: Keep projects on track with AI-enhanced monitoring that flags risks early, optimizes resource allocation, and predicts bottlenecks before they impact delivery.

devops.title: DevOps Services
devops.description: Continuous delivery pipelines with intelligent automation and monitoring
devops.helpText: Implement DevOps practices that reduce deployment time from weeks to hours, with AI-powered monitoring that catches issues before they affect users.

dba.title: Database Administration
dba.description: Database management, optimization, and AI-enhanced performance tuning
dba.helpText: Ensure your databases perform optimally with AI-assisted query optimization and predictive maintenance that prevents issues before they impact operations.

managedServices.title: Managed Services
managedServices.description: 24/7 operations support with proactive AI-driven maintenance

features.title: Incident management
features.description: Rapid response, root cause analysis, resolution

managedServices.helpText: Focus on your business while we manage your infrastructure, with AI systems that predict and prevent issues before they cause downtime.

generativeAI.title: Generative AI Solutions
generativeAI.description: LLM implementation, RAG systems, and custom AI applications
generativeAI.helpText: Implement GenAI solutions that deliver real business value—from 70% cost reduction in customer service to 82% faster document processing.

agenticAI.title: Agentic AI Systems
agenticAI.description: Autonomous AI agents that understand goals and execute tasks independently

features.title: Goal-driven execution
features.description: Agents that break down complex tasks autonomously

agenticAI.helpText: Agentic AI only helps when properly scoped. We start with a 'help assessment'—identifying where autonomous execution adds value versus where human judgment remains essential.

processAutomation.title: Process Automation
processAutomation.description: Intelligent automation combining RPA with AI for end-to-end workflows

features.title: RPA with AI
features.description: Robotic process automation enhanced by ML

processAutomation.helpText: Achieve 30-50% faster process cycles by automating repetitive tasks while maintaining the human oversight critical for trust and compliance.

customAI.title: Custom AI Development
customAI.description: Bespoke AI solutions tailored to your unique business challenges

features.title: Custom model development
features.description: Purpose-built ML/AI models for your data

customAI.helpText: When off-the-shelf solutions don't fit, we build custom AI systems that address your specific needs—with ongoing monitoring to ensure sustained performance.
